review: I have been using the fire tv stick for about a week now. Installation was easy. Love the simplicity of the remote. I am new to streaming, so I recently subscribed to Netflix (had a dvd subscription 8 yrs ago), Hulu Plus, and of course Amazon Prime (which I haven't seen much use for yet). Since I got the Fire Stick, I haven't watched 'regular' tv. It is always in sync, although I experienced buffering 2/3x (internet speed 50mps). I would highly recommend.
